name: Milieu (Joshua Aubrey)
description:
This is a Pico-8 game built during a game jam at university. The theme being "You control the enviroment not the character". 

The character in Milieu finds themselves in a rectanglar room and goes off exploring the areas. 

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

N/M to rotate

More control options can be found to the right of the game in the webpage.
